downloadTitle: Physics Illustrator for Tablet PC Source Code
downloadDescription: Physics Illustrator for Tablet PC is a two-dimensional, rigid-body kinematic simulator for the Tablet PC. Last published: January 3, 2006.
detailsSection: Physics Illustrator for Tablet PC is a two-dimensional, rigid-body kinematic simulator for the Tablet PC. In Physics Illustrator for Tablet PC you can draw bodies, connect them in various ways, and animate them by applying forces. Animated bodies collide and interact according to the connections and forces that you define. Physics Illustrator for Tablet PC uses shape recognition to help you create and define bodies and forces
